snippet.title: Asphalt - Amstrad CPC
snippet.description:
Really nice french game. Plenty of challenge in this one as you need to keep everything in mind. Has to keep an eye on how many bullets is left in the turret gun, as it takes a good handfull of seconds for it to reload .. and at the same time remember to keep moving so you dont get hit by the enemies (or at least less hard) and keep the damaged parts out of shooting range if possible. Mines are nice but limited. The flame weapon seems to be in there just for show, because if an enemy actually get into range of the weapons, then its already too close and should have been dispatched of earlier.

Asphalt by UbiSoft 1987.
